about_the_game:
Story introduction


You are the savior, the heroine needs you to conquer, the world needs you to save.

In the end times, the endless despair and cold sadness burst out of the desperate feelings and desires, giving people the strength to rise above all sorrows and troubles, and the hope of living.
As the leading actor, you participate in and experience the sad experiences of 5 sexy heroines. And, through your powerful genes to conquer the heroine, complete your mission.
The hero used to be just a man who had no sense of existence. But in the end of the day, because of the unwillingness to ordinary heart and unyielding will, got the opportunity to save the world. A chance to gain great power by conquering (fighting the heroine by eliminating the game) five special status constitutions of the heroine. Whenever desperate time, play a variety of body movements, conquer every heroine. Make love to the heroine and get great power, and then save the danger again and again. In the end, he succeeds in obtaining the 5 angel powers and saves the world in his own way.

Game operation introduction


This is not a simple Lianlian game, not the same pattern can be eliminated. Before the game, please open the question mark interface according to the guide point to understand the matching pattern of sex graphics, which is conducive to your faster expansion of the game.
Perhaps you do not need to understand the matching pattern through the question mark interface, then you need to use your imagination to use the sex position you think you can, so that the sex pattern in the game interface is eliminated faster. After the ordinary sex pattern match is eliminated, the corresponding game currency will be obtained, and the new heroine can be found through the game currency.
You can get a heartbeat buff by interacting with your hands and lips. In addition to the ordinary pattern, there are also three special pattern matches. After the special pattern is successfully matched, you can complete a heartbeat value increase, and after the heartbeat value is full, you can achieve a critical strike, which also acts on the woman on the right and the progress bar below the game area. After the progress bar is topped for the first time, you can remove the woman's coat and show the underwear status. After the progress bar is topped for the second time, the woman can remove her underwear and show her naked state. In this process, interactive buttons can be used to touch the heroine to get sensory stimulation. When the progress bar is topped up for the third time through elimination, the heroine's angel power will be obtained. On the far right side of the interface is the heartbeat progress bar, which can be reached by interactive touch, or can be obtained directly by "+" purchase. After the heart value is full, the match of any pattern in the game can increase the heartbeat value, which can allow you to get a new heroine more quickly. Until the heartbeat value completely returns to zero, the game pattern returns to normal matching. Unlocking the heroine behind will require more game coins, so the stronger your pattern matching ability, the more beneficial to the promotion of the game and the acquisition of game coins.
Then depending on how much imagination you have, it directly determines how many heroines you can conquer. Take action, in the game, fully exercise your sex posture. At the same time, by interacting with the heroine, get more excitement, and push you to continue to explore their secrets and touching experiences.

content_descriptors.notes:
The matching pattern uses abstract sexual patterns, often with men and women in different poses.
Some dynamic characters contain nudity and sexual content.

name: Oh Yeah

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB,OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: How much imagination do you have about the ways of love?
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
*languages with full audio support
